sentence.Network_en: The men are very insistent that you leave right away.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们坚决要求你立即离开。

sentence.Network_en: "When can I see him?" Her tone was insistent now.
sentence.Network_cn: “我什么时候能见他？”她的语气变得坚决。

sentence.Network_en: The doctor demurred, but Piercey was insistent.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生提出异议，但皮尔西却一再坚持。

日常英语 - 豆丁网 ... inorganic a. 无生物的；无机的 insistent a. 坚持的；逼人注意的 inspiration n. 灵感；妙想；鼓舞.
坚持-的英语翻译-bab.la词典 ... 坚持的 insistent 坚持不懈的 insistent 坚持的 consistent.
上海翻译公司整理-商务英语词汇 ... growth 生长,发展 insistent 坚持的; 显著的 feedback 反馈.

list.abs: Building would not , he insisted , be frozen anywhere in Jerusalem ., 他坚称不会冻结在耶路撒冷任何地方的建设工程.
unforgivingly , he insisted that she pay her debt to the last penny ., 他坚持要她还清他全部的钱 , 真是不体谅人.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... existence n 存在，生存 insist v 坚持；硬要 insistence n 坚持；强调.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... inside prep. 在……里面 insist vi. 坚持；坚决认为 inspect vt. 检查；检验；审视.

means.word_mean: 固执的,坚持的,不屈服的
强调的,肯定的,有信心的

entry.def: Someone who is insistent keeps insisting that a particular thing should be done or is the case.

example.ex: The men are very insistent that you leave right away.
example.tran: 他们坚决要求你立即离开。

example.ex: He is most insistent on this point...

entry.tran: (噪音、节奏等)持续的,经久不息的
entry.def: An insistent noise or rhythm keeps going on for a long time and holds your attention.

example.ex: ...the insistent rhythms of the Caribbean and Latin America.
example.tran: 加勒比海与拉丁美洲经久不息的韵律节拍

sentences.sentence: "regarded literary questions as exigent and momentous"- H.L.Mencken

auth_sentence.content: She can be insistent about sticking to a budget.
auth_sentence.res_content: She can be insistent about sticking to a budget.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She can be insistent about sticking to a budget.

auth_sentence.content: An insistent electric bell shrilled without respite.
auth_sentence.res_content: An insistent electric bell shrilled without respite.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An insistent electric bell shrilled without respite.

auth_sentence.content: But modern life moves to a syncopated, insistent and incessant beat.
auth_sentence.res_content: But modern life moves to a syncopated, insistent and incessant beat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But modern life moves to a syncopated, insistent and incessant beat.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,通常表示"……人",也可以表示其他具体物.; 3. 表名词,"……药剂"

stems_affixes.word_buile: excel优胜,超越+ent……的→excellent卓越的,极好的
insist坚持+ent……的→adj.坚持的;逼人注意的
sent感觉+i+ent……的→adj.有知觉的,知悉的
sil+ent……的→adj.寂静的,沉默的,无声的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 短暂的,转瞬即逝的;临时的,暂住的
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans转移+i+ent……的→adj.短暂的,转瞬即逝的;临时的,暂住的
reside居住+ent……人→n.居民,常住者 adj.居住的
deterge使清洁+ent……药剂→adj.净化的 n.清洁剂
correspond通信+ent……人→n.记者,通讯员;通信者
reside居住+ent……人→n.居民,常住者 adj.居住的

stems_affixes.value_cn: [大中学校的]学生;研究者,学者

stems_affixes.word_buile: deterge使清洁+ent……药剂→adj.净化的 n.清洁剂
re再+ag做+ent……药剂→再次作用→反应,引申为化学试剂

sentences.en: In spite of the rain he was insistent on going out.
sentences.cn: 尽管下雨, 他仍然坚持外出。

sentences.en: There was an insistent knock on my door.
sentences.cn: 我听到一阵急促的敲门声。
